title: PBS Frontline
body: <p><a title="Ern" href="http://ern.hopto.org/blog">Ern</a> sent me a <a href="http://www.pbs.org/wgbh/pages/frontline/shows/choice2004/view/" title="frontline: the choice 2004">link to this PBS show</a>.  He assures me that it is loaded with all kinds of facts about Bush &amp; Kerry. (what about Nader?)  He said that he doesn't understand how anyone could ever vote for Bush after watching it.  I haven't watched it yet, but I have a feeling I'll agree with him.</p>
